summary: Email correspondence between Assistant United States Attorneys regarding the death of Efrain Reyes, a potential witness in Epstein/MCC-related matters. The email confirms that Reyes's testimony was not needed for the case.

persons.name: Efrain Reyes
persons.context: Deceased individual who was a potential witness in Epstein/MCC-related matters, died in his sleep possibly due to drug-related causes.

events.title: Death of Efrain Reyes
events.description: Efrain Reyes died in his sleep; the cause is suspected to be drug-related given his history.

keyFacts: Efrain Reyes, a potential witness in Epstein/MCC-related matters, died on or before November 30, 2020.
The death was reported by Probation and occurred in his sleep, possibly drug-related.
Prosecutors confirmed they did not need Reyes's testimony for the Epstein/MCC case.
